AboutSection.title: About Grub
AboutSection.description: Grub is revolutionizing corporate dining with our innovative meal management platform. We connect businesses, employees, and local restaurants to create a seamless and delightful dining experience.

questions.benefitsForEmployers: What are the benefits for employers?
questions.partnerWithGrub: How do restaurants partner with Grub?
questions.availableInMyArea: Is Grub available in my area?
questions.dietaryRestrictions: How does Grub handle dietary restrictions and allergies?
questions.accommodateBusinesses: Can Grub accommodate both small businesses and large corporations?
questions.paymentSecurity: How secure is the payment process through Grub?

answers.howDoesGrubWork: Grub streamlines meal management for companies by providing an easy-to-use platform for employees to order meals, integrating with payroll systems, and partnering with local restaurants.
answers.benefitsForEmployers: Employers benefit from simplified meal management, increased employee satisfaction, and streamlined accounting processes for meal-related expenses.
answers.partnerWithGrub: Restaurants can partner with Grub by signing up on our platform. We provide them with access to a broader customer base and streamlined ordering processes.
answers.availableInMyArea: Grub is currently expanding its services to major cities across the United States. Please check our coverage area page or contact our sales team to see if we're available in your location.
answers.dietaryRestrictions: Grub allows employees to set their dietary preferences and allergies in their profiles. Our platform then filters meal options accordingly, ensuring that employees only see meals that meet their dietary needs.
answers.accommodateBusinesses: Yes, Grub's platform is scalable and can accommodate businesses of all sizes. We offer customizable solutions to meet the unique needs of both small businesses and large corporations.
answers.paymentSecurity: Grub uses industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect all financial transactions. We comply with PCI DSS standards and regularly undergo security audits to ensure the safety of our users' data.

Testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
Testimonials.sarahJohnsonContent: Grub has revolutionized our meal management process. Our employees love the variety of options, and our accounting team appreciates the seamless integration.
Testimonials.michaelChenContent: Since partnering with Grub, we've seen a significant increase in employee satisfaction. The platform is user-friendly and efficient.
Testimonials.emilyRodriguezContent: Grub has made lunchtime a breeze for our team. The ordering process is smooth, and the integration with our payroll system is flawless.
Testimonials.davidKimContent: As a restaurant partner, Grub has opened up a whole new customer base for us. Their platform is easy to use and has significantly boosted our business.
Testimonials.lisaPatelContent: The integrated payroll deductions feature has streamlined our accounting processes. Grub has saved us countless hours of administrative work.
Testimonials.tomWilsonContent: Our team loves the customizable menus and scheduled orders. It's made our meal planning effortless and keeps everyone happy.

TestimonialsPage.title: Client Testimonials
TestimonialsPage.description: Discover what our clients have to say about their experience with Grub. From streamlined meal management to increased employee satisfaction, hear how Grub is transforming corporate dining.

TermsOfService.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfService.intro: Please read these Terms of Service ("Terms", "Terms of Service") carefully before using the Grub website and service operated by Grub, Inc.

1.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
1.content: By accessing or using our Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you disagree with any part of the terms, then you may not access the Service.

2.title: 2. Use of Service
2.content: Our Service allows you to order meals from participating restaurants for yourself or your team. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password and for restricting access to your account.

3.title: 3. Content
3.content: Our Service allows you to post, link, store, share and otherwise make available certain information, text, graphics, or other material ("Content"). You are responsible for the Content that you post on or through the Service.

4.title: 4. Accounts
4.content: When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Failure to do so constitutes a breach of the Terms, which may result in immediate termination of your account on our Service.

5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
5.content: The Service and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Grub, Inc. and its licensors.

6.title: 6. Links To Other Web Sites
6.content: Our Service may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by Grub, Inc. We have no control over, and assume no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services.

7.title: 7. Termination
7.content: We may terminate or suspend access to our Service immediately, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach the Terms.

8.title: 8. Governing Law
8.content: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

9.title: 9. Changes
9.content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: At Grub, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our services.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.description: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, place an order, or contact us for support. This may include:

items.1: Provide, maintain, and improve our services
items.2: Process transactions and send related information
items.3: Send you technical notices, updates, and support messages
items.4: Respond to your comments and questions

sharingOfInformation.title: Sharing of Information
sharingOfInformation.description: We may share your information with:

items.2: Service providers who perform services on our behalf
items.3: Law enforcement or other third parties in response to a legal request

yourChoices.title: Your Choices
yourChoices.description: You can access and update certain information about you from within your Grub account. You may also opt out of receiving promotional communications from us by following the instructions in those messages.

changesToThisPolicy.title: Changes to This Policy
changesToThisPolicy.description: We may change this privacy policy from time to time. If we make changes, we will notify you by revising the date at the top of the policy.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us at:
contactUs.address:
Aion Arete Israel, Ltd.
Kehilat Yahadut Tsarfat, 12
Ma'alot-Tarshiha, 2108349

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Grub is a revolutionary platform that enables companies to support their employees with easy food ordering, seamless payroll integration, and restaurant partnerships.
mission.description2: Our mission is to simplify meal management for businesses of all sizes, creating a win-win situation for employers, employees, and local restaurants.

employers.title: For Employers
employers.description: Simplify meal management and boost employee satisfaction

employees.title: For Employees
employees.description: Enjoy a wide variety of meal options with easy ordering

restaurants.title: For Restaurants
restaurants.description: Expand your customer base and streamline orders

amir.name: Amir Isaac
amir.bio: Amir brings over 15 years of experience in the tech industry, with a passion for revolutionizing corporate dining experiences.

george.name: George Daniel Hayek
george.bio: George has a background in restaurant management and tech entrepreneurship, bringing a unique perspective to Grub's mission.

GeorgeHayekPage.name: George Daniel Hayek
GeorgeHayekPage.introductionContent: George Daniel Hayek brings a unique blend of restaurant management expertise and tech entrepreneurship to Grub. As a CO-Founder, George plays a crucial role in shaping Grub's strategy and operations.
backgroundContent: 10+ years of experience in restaurant management
Successful tech startup founder in the food industry
Bachelor's in Hospitality Management from Cornell University
GeorgeHayekPage.visionContent: George's vision for Grub is to create a platform that not only revolutionizes corporate dining but also empowers local restaurants to thrive in the digital age. He sees Grub as a bridge between the corporate world and the local food scene, fostering community and supporting small businesses.

visionDetails.empoweringRestaurantsContent: George is committed to providing restaurants with the tools and platform they need to expand their customer base and streamline operations.
visionDetails.enhancingCorporateCultureContent: Through Grub, George aims to transform corporate dining into a tool for building stronger, more connected workplace communities.

expertiseContent: Strategic partnerships in the food industry
GeorgeHayekPage.thoughtsQuote: "Grub is more than just a meal management platform. It's a way to bring people together, support local businesses, and create meaningful connections through food."

thoughtsDetails.onInnovationContent: "The future of dining lies at the intersection of technology and hospitality. At Grub, we're constantly innovating to enhance both."
thoughtsDetails.onCommunityContent: "By connecting corporations with local restaurants, we're not just facilitating transactions; we're building stronger, more vibrant communities."

GeorgeHayekPage.contactContent: Interested in learning more about Grub's restaurant partnerships or discussing the future of food tech? Get in touch with George directly.

introduction.name: Amir Isaac
introduction.content: Amir Isaac brings over 15 years of experience in the tech industry, with a passion for revolutionizing corporate dining experiences. As the CO-Founder and CEO of Grub, Amir leads the company's vision and strategy.

background.title: Background
background.point1: Former Product Manager at leading tech companies
background.point2: MBA from Stanford Graduate School of Business
background.point3: Bachelor's in Computer Science from MIT
background.point4: Serial entrepreneur with two successful exits

vision.title: Vision for Grub
vision.content: Amir's vision for Grub is to create a seamless ecosystem that connects companies, employees, and local restaurants. He believes in leveraging technology to solve the complexities of corporate dining, ultimately enhancing workplace satisfaction and supporting local businesses.

detail1.title: Innovating Corporate Dining
detail1.content: Amir aims to transform how companies approach employee meals, making it a seamless and enjoyable experience for all.

detail2.title: Supporting Local Restaurants
detail2.content: Through Grub, Amir envisions creating a platform that helps local restaurants thrive by connecting them with corporate clients.

achievements.title: Achievements
achievements.point1: Led Grub to secure $10 million in Series A funding
achievements.point2: Expanded Grub's operations to 10 major cities across the United States
achievements.point3: Formed partnerships with over 500 local restaurants
achievements.point4: Recognized as 'Innovator of the Year' by TechCrunch in 2023

thoughts.title: Amir's Thoughts
thoughts.quote: "At Grub, we're not just building a meal management platform. We're creating a solution that brings people together, supports local businesses, and makes the workplace a little bit better every day."

detail1.title: On Technology
detail1.content: "Technology should simplify our lives and bring us closer together. That's what we strive for with every feature we develop at Grub."

detail2.title: On Leadership
detail2.content: "Great leaders don't create followers; they create more leaders. At Grub, we're building a team of innovators and problem-solvers."

contact.title: Contact Amir
contact.content: Interested in learning more about Grub or discussing potential partnerships? Get in touch with Amir directly.

introduction.title: Grub for Employees
introduction.content: Enjoy a wide variety of delicious meals with easy ordering and convenient payment options. Grub makes your workday dining experience seamless and enjoyable.

easyOrdering.title: Easy Ordering
easyOrdering.content: Browse menus, customize your meals, and place orders with just a few taps on our user-friendly app.

mealVariety.title: Meal Variety
mealVariety.content: Choose from a wide range of cuisines and restaurants, ensuring you never get bored with your lunch options.

dietaryOptions.title: Dietary Options
dietaryOptions.content: Easily find meals that meet your dietary requirements, whether you're vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, or have other preferences.

convenientPayment.title: Convenient Payment
convenientPayment.content: Enjoy hassle-free payment through automatic payroll deductions or other flexible payment options.

teamBonding.title: Team Bonding
teamBonding.content: Coordinate meals with your colleagues and enjoy lunch together, fostering better team relationships.

steps.1: Download the Grub app and create your account
steps.3: Customize your meal and place your order
steps.5: Receive notifications about your order status

2.name: Mike T., Software Developer

introduction.title: Grub for Employers
introduction.content: Simplify meal management and boost employee satisfaction with Grub's comprehensive solution for corporate dining. Our platform is designed to streamline the entire process, from ordering to payment, making it easier than ever to provide quality meals for your team.

streamlinedOrdering.title: Streamlined Ordering
streamlinedOrdering.content: Our intuitive platform allows employees to easily browse menus, place orders, and customize their meals, all in one place.

reducedOverhead.title: Reduced Administrative Overhead
reducedOverhead.content: Automate the meal management process, reducing the time and resources needed to coordinate corporate dining.

employeeSatisfaction.title: Increased Employee Satisfaction
employeeSatisfaction.content: Offer a wide variety of meal options to cater to different dietary needs and preferences, boosting overall employee satisfaction.

payrollIntegration.title: Easy Integration with Payroll Systems
payrollIntegration.content: Seamlessly integrate Grub with your existing payroll systems for hassle-free meal deductions and expense tracking.

customizablePrograms.title: Customizable Meal Programs
customizablePrograms.content: Tailor your meal program to fit your company's unique needs, whether it's daily lunches, special events, or flexible meal allowances.

steps.1: Set up your company account and customize your meal program
steps.2: Invite employees to join the platform
steps.3: Employees browse menus and place orders
steps.4: Grub coordinates with partner restaurants for meal preparation and delivery
steps.5: Automated payment processing and expense tracking
steps.6: Access detailed analytics and reports on program usage and satisfaction

1.title: TechCorp Streamlines Lunch
1.content: TechCorp implemented Grub and saw a 30% increase in employee satisfaction and a 20% reduction in administrative costs related to meal management.

2.title: StartupX Boosts Team Morale
2.content: StartupX used Grub to offer flexible meal allowances, resulting in improved team collaboration and a more positive work environment.

getStarted.title: Get Started with Grub
getStarted.content: Ready to revolutionize your corporate dining experience? Book a demo with our team to see how Grub can benefit your company.

introduction.title: Grub for Restaurants
introduction.content: Expand your customer base and streamline your operations with Grub. Join our network of restaurants serving delicious meals to corporate clients.

expandedCustomerBase.title: Expanded Customer Base
expandedCustomerBase.content: Reach corporate clients and their employees, significantly expanding your potential customer base.

streamlinedOperations.title: Streamlined Operations
streamlinedOperations.content: Manage orders, payments, and deliveries through our easy-to-use platform, reducing administrative overhead.

increasedRevenue.title: Increased Revenue
increasedRevenue.content: Boost your sales with a steady stream of corporate orders, especially during typically slower business hours.

brandVisibility.title: Brand Visibility
brandVisibility.content: Increase your restaurant's visibility among corporate clients and their employees, potentially leading to more direct business.

dataInsights.title: Data Insights
dataInsights.content: Gain valuable insights into customer preferences and ordering patterns to optimize your menu and operations.

steps.1: Sign up as a Grub restaurant partner
steps.2: Set up your menu and pricing on our platform
steps.4: Prepare and package meals for delivery or pickup
steps.5: Get paid quickly and securely through our system
steps.6: Access reports and insights to grow your business

1.title: Tasty Bites Cafe
1.content: Since partnering with Grub, we've seen a 40% increase in our weekday lunch orders. It's been a game-changer for our business!

2.title: Green Leaf Eatery
2.content: Grub has helped us reach a whole new customer base. We're now the go-to healthy option for several local companies.

joinGrub.title: Join Grub
joinGrub.content: Ready to grow your restaurant business with Grub? Join our network of successful restaurant partners today!

success.title: Message Sent

error.title: Error

DownloadPage.title: Download Grub
DownloadPage.description: Get the Grub app on your device and start enjoying seamless meal ordering for your team.

android.title: Grub for Android
android.description: Enjoy the full Grub experience on your Android device. Order meals, manage your team's preferences, and streamline your corporate dining with ease.

ios.title: Grub for iOS
ios.description: Experience Grub on your iPhone or iPad. Seamlessly integrate with your company's meal program and enjoy a wide variety of dining options at your fingertips.

easyOrdering.title: Easy Ordering
easyOrdering.description: Browse menus, customize your meals, and place orders with just a few taps.

teamManagement.title: Team Management
teamManagement.description: Easily manage your team's orders, preferences, and dietary restrictions all in one place.

realTimeUpdates.title: Real-time Updates
realTimeUpdates.description: Get notifications about your order status, delivery times, and special offers.

CustomizableMenusPage.title: Customizable Menus
CustomizableMenusPage.introduction: Grub's Customizable Menus feature allows you to create tailored meal options that perfectly suit your team's preferences and dietary needs, enhancing the overall dining experience.

menuCreation.title: Menu Creation
menuCreation.description: Design unique menus that reflect your company culture and cater to your employees' tastes, working with our partner restaurants to curate the perfect selection.

dietaryOptions.title: Dietary Options
dietaryOptions.description: Easily incorporate a wide range of dietary options, including vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, and allergen-friendly meals to accommodate all team members.

seasonalRotations.title: Seasonal Rotations
seasonalRotations.description: Keep your menu fresh and exciting with seasonal rotations, featuring locally sourced ingredients and special holiday-themed options.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Consult with our menu specialists to understand your team's preferences.
howItWorks.step2: Work with partner restaurants to create custom dishes or modify existing ones.
howItWorks.step3: Set up your personalized menu within the Grub platform.
howItWorks.step4: Configure dietary options and allergen information for each item.
howItWorks.step5: Implement seasonal rotations and special event menus as desired.
howItWorks.step6: Gather feedback from your team and make adjustments as needed.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.item1: Increased employee satisfaction with personalized meal options.
benefits.item2: Improved inclusivity by catering to various dietary needs and preferences.
benefits.item3: Enhanced company culture through curated dining experiences.
benefits.item4: Better control over nutrition and ingredient quality.
benefits.item5: Flexibility to adapt menus for special events or company milestones.
benefits.item6: Support for local restaurants and seasonal produce.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Ready to create a unique dining experience for your team with Customizable Menus? Contact our team to start designing your perfect menu and elevate your corporate dining program.

EasyEmployeeMealsPage.title: Easy Employee Meals
EasyEmployeeMealsPage.introduction: Simplify meal ordering for your entire team with our intuitive platform. Grub makes it easy for employees to browse menus, place orders, and enjoy delicious meals without the hassle.

intuitiveOrdering.title: Intuitive Ordering
intuitiveOrdering.description: Our user-friendly interface makes it simple for employees to browse menus, select meals, and place orders in just a few clicks.

customization.title: Meal Customization
customization.description: Employees can easily customize their meals to fit their dietary preferences and restrictions, ensuring everyone gets exactly what they want.

groupOrders.title: Group Orders
groupOrders.description: Coordinate team lunches and meetings effortlessly with our group ordering feature, allowing multiple employees to add to a single order.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Employees log in to the Grub platform.
howItWorks.step4: Add items to cart and review order.
howItWorks.step5: Choose payment method (including payroll deduction if enabled).
howItWorks.step7: Enjoy the meal when it arrives!

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.item1: Save time and reduce stress associated with meal planning.
benefits.item2: Increase employee satisfaction with a wide variety of food options.
benefits.item3: Promote team bonding through shared meals and group orders.
benefits.item4: Ensure dietary needs and preferences are met for all employees.
benefits.item5: Streamline the payment process with integrated payroll deductions.
benefits.item6: Support local restaurants and contribute to the community.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Ready to simplify meal management for your team? Contact our sales team to learn more about implementing Grub's Easy Employee Meals feature for your organization.

IntegratedPayrollDeductionsPage.title: Integrated Payroll Deductions
IntegratedPayrollDeductionsPage.introduction: Grub's Integrated Payroll Deductions feature seamlessly connects your company's payroll system with our meal management platform, making it easy to handle meal expenses for both employers and employees.

simplifiedAccounting.title: Simplified Accounting
simplifiedAccounting.description: Automate the process of tracking and deducting meal expenses, reducing administrative overhead and minimizing errors.

employeeConvenience.title: Employee Convenience
employeeConvenience.description: Employees can enjoy meals without worrying about immediate out-of-pocket expenses or reimbursement processes.

taxBenefits.title: Tax Benefits
taxBenefits.description: Properly structured meal programs with payroll deductions can offer tax advantages for both employers and employees.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Grub integrates with your existing payroll system.
howItWorks.step2: Employees order meals through the Grub platform.
howItWorks.step3: Meal expenses are automatically tracked and calculated.
howItWorks.step4: Deductions are processed during the regular payroll cycle.
howItWorks.step5: Detailed reports are generated for accounting and tax purposes.

security.title: Security and Compliance
security.description: Grub's Integrated Payroll Deductions feature is designed with security and compliance in mind. We use industry-standard encryption and follow all relevant data protection regulations to ensure the safety and privacy of your company's and employees' information.
security.item1: End-to-end encryption for all data transfers.
security.item2: Regular security audits and penetration testing.
security.item3: Compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and other applicable regulations.
security.item4: Secure API integrations with major payroll providers.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Ready to streamline your meal program accounting and offer a convenient perk to your employees? Contact our team to learn more about implementing Grub's Integrated Payroll Deductions for your organization.

LowRestaurantFeesPage.title: Low Restaurant Fees
LowRestaurantFeesPage.introduction: Grub's Low Restaurant Fees feature allows you to partner with local restaurants at competitive prices, benefiting both your company and local businesses.

costSavings.title: Cost Savings
costSavings.description: By negotiating lower fees with restaurants, Grub helps your company save on meal expenses without compromising on quality or variety.

increasedParticipation.title: Increased Participation
increasedParticipation.description: Lower fees mean more affordable meals for employees, encouraging higher participation in your company's meal program.

localSupport.title: Local Business Support
localSupport.description: By partnering with local restaurants, you're supporting your community's economy while providing diverse meal options to your employees.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Grub negotiates competitive rates with local restaurants.
howItWorks.step2: Restaurants are integrated into the Grub platform.
howItWorks.step3: Your company selects preferred restaurant partners.
howItWorks.step4: Employees order from these restaurants at discounted rates.
howItWorks.step5: Grub handles all payments and logistics.

techCorpSavings.title: TechCorp Savings
techCorpSavings.description: TechCorp saved 20% on their annual meal expenses after implementing Grub's Low Restaurant Fees program.

localBistroGrowth.title: Local Bistro Growth
localBistroGrowth.description: A local bistro saw a 30% increase in orders after partnering with Grub and offering competitive rates to nearby businesses.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Ready to start saving on your company's meal expenses while supporting local businesses? Contact our team to learn more about implementing Grub's Low Restaurant Fees program for your organization.

ScheduledOrdersPage.title: Scheduled Orders
ScheduledOrdersPage.introduction: Grub's Scheduled Orders feature allows you to set up recurring orders for your team, streamlining the meal planning process and ensuring everyone gets their favorite meals on time.

recurringOrders.title: Recurring Orders
recurringOrders.description: Set up daily, weekly, or monthly meal orders for individuals or teams, ensuring consistent meal delivery without manual intervention.

flexibleScheduling.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexibleScheduling.description: Choose specific days, times, and frequencies for meal deliveries to accommodate various work schedules and team needs.

customization.title: Customization Options
customization.description: Tailor recurring orders with meal rotations, dietary preferences, and the ability to easily modify or pause schedules as needed.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Access the Scheduled Orders feature in your Grub dashboard.
howItWorks.step2: Select the individuals or teams for whom you want to set up recurring orders.
howItWorks.step3: Choose the frequency, days, and times for meal deliveries.
howItWorks.step4: Select meals or set up meal rotations based on preferences.
howItWorks.step5: Review and confirm the scheduled orders.
howItWorks.step6: Grub automatically processes and delivers meals according to the schedule.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.item1: Time-saving: Eliminate the need for daily manual order placement.
benefits.item2: Consistency: Ensure regular meal deliveries for your team.
benefits.item3: Customization: Cater to individual preferences and dietary needs.
benefits.item4: Cost control: Better budget management with predictable ordering.
benefits.item5: Improved planning: Streamline meal logistics for your organization.
benefits.item6: Flexibility: Easily adjust schedules to accommodate changing needs.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Ready to simplify your team's meal planning with Scheduled Orders? Contact our team to learn more about implementing this feature for your organization and start enjoying the benefits of automated meal management.

TeamManagementPage.title: Team Management
TeamManagementPage.introduction: Grub's Team Management feature allows you to easily manage teams, departments, and individual meal preferences all in one place, streamlining your corporate dining experience.

groupOrdering.title: Group Ordering
groupOrdering.description: Easily coordinate meals for team meetings, events, or daily lunches with our intuitive group ordering system.

dietaryManagement.title: Dietary Management
dietaryManagement.description: Keep track of team members' dietary restrictions and preferences to ensure everyone's needs are met.

budgetControl.title: Budget Control
budgetControl.description: Set and manage meal budgets for individuals, teams, or departments to keep costs under control.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.step1: Set up teams and departments within the Grub platform.
howItWorks.step2: Invite team members and assign roles (e.g., team lead, member).
howItWorks.step3: Configure meal preferences and dietary restrictions for each member.
howItWorks.step4: Set budgets and ordering permissions as needed.
howItWorks.step5: Use the platform to coordinate group orders and manage team meals.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.item1: Improved team coordination and communication around meals.
benefits.item2: Enhanced employee satisfaction through personalized meal experiences.
benefits.item3: Better cost control and budget management for corporate dining.
benefits.item4: Time savings for administrators and team leads.
benefits.item5: Increased visibility into team dining habits and preferences.

getStarted.title: Get Started
getStarted.description: Ready to revolutionize how you manage team meals and corporate dining? Contact our team to learn more about implementing Grub's Team Management feature for your organization.

FeaturesPage.title: Grub Features
FeaturesPage.description: Discover how Grub revolutionizes meal management for your team. Our comprehensive set of features is designed to streamline ordering, simplify accounting, and enhance the overall dining experience for your employees.
